Description (EN): 1 to reverse the default winding algorithm along the airgap (c, b, a instead of a, b, c along the trigonometric direction)
Class description: Winding class generating connection matrix using Star of slots method (coupling with SWAT-EM)

Description (EN): 0 not to change the stator winding connection matrix built by pyleecan number of slots to shift the coils obtained with pyleecan winding algorithm (a, b, c becomes b, c, a with Nslot_shift_wind1=1)
number of parallel circuits per phase (maximum 2p)
straight length of the conductors outside the lamination before the curved part of winding overhang [m] - can be negative to tune the average turn length
Winding matrix calculated with Star of slots (from SWAT_EM package)
